official_title: A bill to amend section 4 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to permit the Securities and Exchange Commission to accept certain payment and reimbursements with respect to attendance at meetings and conferences concerning the functions of the Commission.

summary.text: Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to allow the Securities and Exchange Commission to accept reimbursement from non-Federal sources for travel, subsistence, and other necessary expenses incurred by members and employees in attending conferences concerning the functions or activities of the Commission.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to permit the Securities and Exchange Commission to accept certain payment and reimbursements with respect to attendance at meetings and conferences concerning the functions of the Commission.
